rules_text:
Cast this spell only if you control at least three creatures with flying.
Creatures you control with flying get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number opponents you have. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, create a tapped Treasure token.
flavor_text: [i]“For the honor of the Pegasus knights of Ilia, I will annihilate the foe!”[/i]
